name: SUPER FLAME BIER
description:
Crack open a couple cold ones with the boys - then crack one over their heads! SUPER FLAME BIER is a two player beer-slinging bonanza where you toss flaming pints of beer at your opponent! Slap em with beer kegs, spray them with beer taps or just conk em on the mug with your stein!

Created for the Beer SK jam and exhibition!

Menu/Attract mode
-  A/S  - Start single player mode against computer
-  K/L -  Start two player (versus) mode
- If the game is left unattended for 45 seconds it will enter Attract mode - watch two computer controlled players duke it out!

Controls - Player One
-  A  - Tap/hold to fly
-  S -  Hold to charge up a beer, and release to lob it at your opponent

Controls - Player Two
-  K - Tap/hold to fly
-  L -  Hold to charge up a beer, and release chuck a pint at your mate

Options / Exhibitor Controls
- 1 / F1 - Toggle CRT Filter (off by default)
- 2 / F2 - Adjust music volume
- 3 / F3 - Adjust sound effects volume
- 4 / F4 - Toggle fullscreen

Completion stats
- Jam Length - ~1 week (20 August - 27 August 2017)
- Development Length - ~7 days

SFX  - All SFX have been composited from or modified from their original sources;

  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #1, alternative link here
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #2
  • Soniss GDC Game Audio Bundle #3
  • Universal Sound FX
